/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, creating a corridor of urban life. Cars and motorcycles are scattered along the road, hinting at the constant movement and energy of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, with a faint crescent moon visible in the top left corner, adding a touch of tranquility to the otherwise busy scene. The colors in the image are predominantly blue, green, and gray, reflecting the blend of natural and man-made elements in the cityscape.
